about_the_game:
Crime pays. SHLEMO is a dynamic, brutal, dark 2D shooter with a wide range of weapons and the ability to use the environment to your advantage.



Set in 2008 Akimbo City, which has a notorious reputation for crime and is home to a wide range of criminals and killers, all of whom operate without much trouble from the authorities.
The news spreads throughout the city that a briefcase has been stolen from the largest illegal transaction in its history. This immediately arouses the interest of all criminal groups, everyone wants to know what is inside the briefcase and take it for themselves.

You control the actions of 3 different main characters, each with a different story, skills and motives.

  • Make your way through buildings full of armed bandits using their own weapons!
  • When weapons aren't enough, use the environment to your advantage!
  • Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark corrupt city!
  • Listen to the atmospheric, depressing soundtrack that perfectly reflects what you do!
  • Decide which main character you like the most and see what fate befalls him!
  • Happy ending....?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all age groups. Frequent violence or brutality, Mature content, swearing, gore.
